nodes.text: This was a tablet that belonged to the Sith Master Jorak Uln, the former Headmaster of the Sith Academy on the planet Korriban. The former Sith Lord turned Jedi Padawan Revan killed Uln in the tomb of the Sith Lord Tulak Hord, and may have presented Uln's tablet to Uln's former Sith apprentice and Headmaster, Uthar Wynn.
Jorak Uln's tablet was an item featured in the 2003 Xbox and PC video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.
